fullplot: Director Ethan Hawke explores the life and lessons of piano teacher Seymour Bernstein.
plot: Meet Seymour Bernstein: a beloved pianist, teacher and true inspiration who shares eye-opening insights from an amazing life. Ethan Hawke helms this poignant guide to life.
title: Seymour: An Introduction

tomatoes.consensus: Seymour Bernstein's genuineness shines so brightly in Seymour: An Introduction that viewers will forgive debuting director Ethan Hawke's reverent treatment.
